00019 #ifndef UVM_RESOURCE_DB_H
00020 #define UVM_RESOURCE_DB_H
00021 
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include <typeinfo>
00029 #include "base/uvm_resource_pool.h"
00030 #include "base/uvm_resource_t.h"
00031 #include "base/uvm_globals.h"
00032 
00033 namespace uvm {
00034 
00035 
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 //
00039 template<class T>
00040 class uvm_resource_db
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     typedef uvm_resource<T>* rsrc_ptr_t;
00044     typedef uvm_resource<T>  rsrc_t;
00045 
00046     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     //
00049     uvm_resource_db() {};
00050 
00051 
00052     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054     //
00055     ~uvm_resource_db() {};
00056     
00057     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00065     static rsrc_ptr_t get_by_name(std::string scope, std::string name)
00066     {
00067         uvm_resource_base * rsrc_base = NULL;
00068         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = NULL;
00069 
00070         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00071         //rsrc = rpool->get_by_name(scope, name, typeid(rsrc_ptr_t));
00072         rsrc_base = rpool->get_by_name(scope, name, typeid(rsrc_ptr_t));
00073         if (rsrc_base != NULL)
00074             rsrc = DCAST<rsrc_ptr_t> (rsrc_base);
00075         return rsrc;
00076     }
00077 
00078     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 
00087     static rsrc_ptr_t get_by_name_regex(std::string scope, std::string name)
00088     {
00089         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = NULL;
00090 
00091         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00092         rsrc = rpool->get_by_name_regex(scope, name, typeid(rsrc_ptr_t));
00093     }
00094 
00095 
00096     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 
00105     static rsrc_ptr_t set_default(std::string scope, std::string name)
00106     {
00107         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = new rsrc_t(name, scope);
00108         rsrc->set();
00109         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_SET_DEFAULT, scope, name, rsrc);
00110     }
00111 
00112     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 
00120     static void set(std::string scope, std::string name, T value)
00121     {
00122         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = new rsrc_t(name, scope);
00123         rsrc->write(value);
00124         rsrc->set();
00125         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_SET, scope, name, rsrc);
00126     }
00127 
00128     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 
00136     static void set_override(std::string scope, std::string name, T value)
00137     {
00138         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = new rsrc_t(name, scope);
00139         rsrc->write(value);
00140         rsrc->set_override();
00141         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_SET_OVERRIDE, scope, name, rsrc);
00142     }
00143 
00144     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 
00155     static bool read_by_name(std::string scope, std::string name, T &value)
00156     {
00157         bool       bsuccess = false;
00158         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc     = get_by_name(scope, name);
00159 
00160         if (rsrc != NULL)
00161         {
00162             value = rsrc->read();
00163             bsuccess = true;
00164         }
00165         return bsuccess;
00166 
00167     }
00168 
00169     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 
00180     static bool write_by_name(std::string scope, std::string name, T value) 
00181     {
00182         bool       bsuccess = false;
00183         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc     = get_by_name(scope, name);
00184 
00185         if (rsrc != NULL)
00186         {
00187             rsrc->write(value);
00188             bsuccess = true;
00189         }
00190 
00191         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_WRITE_BY_NAME, scope, name, rsrc);
00192         return bsuccess;
00193     }
00194 
00195     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 
00205     static bool exists(std::string scope, std::string name)
00206     {
00207         if (get_by_name(scope, name) != NULL)
00208             return 1;
00209         else
00210             return 0;
00211     }
00212 
00213 };
00214 
00215 }   // namespace
00216 
00217 #endif // UVM_RESOURCE_DB_H
